channel.title: [317] why npc dont walk? EDITED QUESTION a bit!
channel.description:
my npc dont walk on my server :(
spawn = 1 3086 3490 0 3084 3487 3088 3492 2 man
what i did wrong?
EDIT:i found but can they walk faster??
thx grtz, KoF

item.title: [317] why npc dont walk? EDITED QUESTION a bit!
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:6, topic:319724”]Some sources don’t allow npc walking.
In the npchandler class look for: public void newnpc
Make sure newNPC.RandomWalk is set to true.

if(WalkingType == 1){ newNPC.RandomWalk = true; } [/quote]

this is my code at the npchandler class:

/*if(WalkingType == 1) newNPC.RandomWalk = true;*/

EDIT: ok its works ty
can they walk faster??

Read full topic
item.source: [317] why npc dont walk? EDITED QUESTION a bit!

item.title: [317] why npc dont walk? EDITED QUESTION a bit!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Some sources don’t allow npc walking.
In the npchandler class look for: public void newnpc
Make sure newNPC.RandomWalk is set to true.

if(WalkingType == 1){
     newNPC.RandomWalk = true;
}

Read full topic

item.title: [317] why npc dont walk? EDITED QUESTION a bit!
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:4, topic:319724”]Oh yeah, Sorry.
Its the 2, Beside man.

The 2 should be a 1.[/quote]

first i had : spawn = 1 3086 3490 0 3084 3487 3088 3492 1 man
but they dont move:(
i dont know why:(
